subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With all the progress the Mets have made under Willie Randolph and Omar Minaya, the Art Howe era is easily forgotten. It was marked by mishmash lineups, bizarre injuries and prolonged losing streaks.
snippet: With all the progress the Mets have made under Willie Randolph and Omar Minaya, the Art Howe era is easily forgotten. It was marked by mishmash lineups, bizarre injuries and prolonged losing streaks.
